help_exterr_UPb.en: When this box is ticked, the thickness of the concordia line will be adjusted to show the analytical uncertainty associated with the decay constants and <sup>238</sup>U/<sup>235</sup>U-ratio.  This uncertainty will also be propagated into any concordia or discordia age calculations.
help_exterr_UPb.cn: 勾选此框，将调整谐和曲线的厚度，以显示与<sup>235</sup>U和<sup>238</sup>U衰减常数相关的分析不确定度。

help_verticals.en: When this box is ticked, the horizontal steps are connected with vertical lines
help_verticals.cn: 勾选此框，水平台阶将与垂直线相连

help_normalise.en: When this box is ticked, the area under each of the KDEs (and histograms) will be normalised to a common value. Otherwise, the KDE will use the entire range of y-values available.
help_normalise.cn: 勾选此框后，每个KDE曲线（和直方图）下的区域将标准化为普通值。否则，KDE曲线将使用整个可用的y值范围。

help_isochron_exterr.en: When this box is ticked, the analytical uncertainty associated with the radioactive decay constant and the non-radiogenic isotope composition is propagated into the age.
help_isochron_exterr.cn: 当勾选此框时，与放射性衰变常数和非放射性同位素组成相关的分析不确定性将传递到该年龄。

help_age_exterr.en: When this box is ticked, the analytical uncertainty associated with the 235U and 238U decay constants will be propagated into the age calculations. This is recommended if each aliquot corresponds to a separate sample, but not if they belong to the same sample. In that case, the decay constant uncertainties will introduce correlated errors which are lost in output table. IsoplotR's concordia and radial plot functions were designed to take into account this correlation.
help_age_exterr.cn: 勾选此框后，与<sup>235</sup>U和<sup>238</sup>U衰减常数相关的分析不确定性将传递到年龄计算中。 如果每个数据对应于单独的样品，则建议使用此选项，但如果它们属于同一样品则不推荐。 其中，衰减常数不确定性将引入在输出表中丢失的相关误差。IsoplotR的谐和曲线图和雷达图函数旨在考虑这种相关性。

help_exterr.en: When this box is ticked, the analytical uncertainty associated with decay constants, calibration factors, etc. will be propagated into the age.
help_exterr.cn: 勾选此框，与衰减常数，校准因子等相关的分析不确定性将传递到年龄中。

help_exterr_radial.en: When this box is ticked, the analytical uncertainty associated with decay constants, calibration factors, etc. will be propagated into the central age and mixture models.
help_exterr_radial.cn: '勾选此框时，与衰变常数和矫正因子等相关的分析误差将被传递到中值年龄和混合模型。

help_zeta_exterr.en: When this box is ticked, the analytical uncertainty associated with the standard age and dosimeter glass will be propagated into the ζ-calibration factor.
help_zeta_exterr.cn: 勾选此框后，与标准年龄和放射性玻璃相关的分析不确定度将传递到ζ–校准系数中。

help_PbPb_growth.en: When this box is ticked, <tt>IsoplotR</tt> adds Stacey & Kramer (1975)'s two-stage Pb growth curve to the plot. This shows the evolution of the Pb isotopic composition for a hypothesised Earth reservoir with a fixed U/Pb ratio.
help_PbPb_growth.cn: 当勾选此框时，<tt>IsoplotR</tt> 将Stacey＆Kramer（1975）的两阶段Pb增长曲线添加到图中。这显示了具有固定U/Pb比值的假设地球储库的Pb同位素组成的演变。

help_nnlines.en: To help identify groups of samples on the MDS configuration whilst simultaneously assessing the goodness-of-fit, it is sometimes useful to add 'nearest neighbour lines', in which each sample is connected to its closest neighbour in Kolmogorov-Smirnov space with a solid line, and to its second-closest neighbour with a dashed line. If the nearest neighbour lines cause too much clutter, it is better to omit them.
help_nnlines.cn: 为了帮助识别MDS配置上的样品组，同时评估拟合优度，有时添加“最近相邻线（nearest neighbour lines）”是有用的，其中每个样品连接到Kolmogorov-Smirnov空间中最近邻样品的实线，并用虚线表示其第二个最近的相邻样品。如果最近相邻线引起太多杂乱，最好省略它们。

help_samebandwidth.en: To facilitate the visual comparison of multiple KDEs, it is useful to use a common bandwidth. This can either be inforced by forcing the the bandwidth using the appropriate text box or, if the bandwidth is set to <tt>auto</tt>, by ticking this box here. In that case, <tt>IsoplotR</tt> will use the median of all the automatically calculated bandwidths, obtained using the Botev et al. (2010) algorithm.
help_samebandwidth.cn: 为了便于多个KDE曲线的视觉比较，使用公共带宽很有用。这可以通过使用适当的文本框强制带宽来强制执行，或者如果带宽设置为auto，可以通过勾选此框来强制执行此操作。 其中，<tt>IsoplotR</tt> 将使用Botev et al. (2010)获得的所有自动计算带宽的中值。

help_SmNd_i2i.en:
Ticking this box uses the y-intercept of an isochron fit through all the Sm-Nd data as an initial 
<sup>143</sup>Nd/<sup>144</sup>Nd-ratio for the age calculations. Unticking it uses the ratio given above.
help_SmNd_i2i.cn: 选中此框使用所有Sm-Nd数据拟合的等时线的y轴截距作为年龄计算的初始<sup>143</sup>Nd/<sup>144</sup>Nd比值。取消选中使用上面给出的比值。

help_ReOs_i2i.en: Ticking this box uses the y-intercept of an isochron fit through all the Re-Os data as an initial <sup>187</sup>Os/<sup>188</sup>Os-ratio for the age calculations. Unticking it uses the ratio of the <sup>187</sup>Os/<sup>192</sup>Os- and <sup>188</sup>Os/<sup>192</sup>Os-ratios above.
help_ReOs_i2i.cn: 选中此框使用所有Re-Os数据拟合的等时线的y轴截距作为年龄计算的初始<sup>187</sup>Os/<sup>188</sup>Os比值。取消选中则使用上面的<sup>187</sup>Os/<sup>192</sup>Os和<sup>188</sup>Os/<sup>192</sup>Os比值。

help_RbSr_i2i.en:
Ticking this box uses the y-intercept of an isochron fit through all the Rb-Sr data as an initial 
<sup>87</sup>Sr/<sup>86</sup>Sr-ratio for the age calculations. Unticking it uses the ratio given above.
help_RbSr_i2i.cn: 选中此框使用所有Rb-Sr数据拟合的等时线的y轴截距作为年龄计算的初始<sup>87</sup>Sr/<sup>86</sup>Sr比值。取消选中使用上面给出的比值。

help_LuHf_i2i.en:
Ticking this box uses the y-intercept of an isochron fit through all the Lu-Hf data as an initial 
<sup>176</sup>Hf/<sup>177</sup>Hf-ratio for the age calculations. Unticking it uses the ratio given above.
help_LuHf_i2i.cn: 选中此框使用所有Lu-Hf数据拟合的等时线的y轴截距作为年龄计算的初始<sup>176</sup>Hf/<sup>177</sup>Hf比值。取消选中使用上面给出的比值。

help_KCa_i2i.en:
Ticking this box uses the y-intercept of an isochron fit through all the K-Ca data as an initial 
<sup>40</sup>Ca/<sup>44</sup>Ca-ratio for the age calculations. Unticking it uses the <sup>40</sup>Ca/<sup>44</sup>Ca-ratio above.
help_KCa_i2i.cn: 选中此框使用所有K-Ca数据拟合等时线的y轴截距作为年龄计算的初始<sup>40</sup>Ca/<sup>44</sup>Ca比值。取消选中使用上面的<sup>40</sup>Ca/<sup>44</sup>Ca比值。

help_ArAr_i2i.en:
Ticking this box uses the y-intercept of an isochron fit through all the Ar data as an initial 
<sup>40</sup>Ar/<sup>36</sup>Ar-ratio for the age calculations. Unticking it uses the atmospheric ratio specified above.
help_ArAr_i2i.cn: 选中此框使用所有Ar数据拟合的等时线的y轴截距作为年龄计算的初始<sup>40</sup>Ar/<sup>36</sup>Ar比值。取消选中使用上面指定的大气比值。

help_ThU_i2i.en: Ticking this box uses and isochron fit to estimate the initial <sup>230</sup>Th-component.
help_ThU_i2i.cn: 选中此框使用和等时线拟合估计初始<sup>230</sup>Th分量。

help_shepard.en: Ticking this box replaces the MDS configuration with a 'Shepard plot', in which the goodness-of-fit of a (non-metric) MDS configuration is evaluated by plotting the fitted distances/disparities against the Kolmogorov-Smirnov dissimilarities. The title of this plot shows Kruskal's 'stress' parameter. As a rule of thumb, stress values of 0, 0.025, 0.05, 0.1 and 0.2 indicate 'perfect', 'excellent', 'good', 'fair' and 'poor' fits, respectively.
help_shepard.cn: 选中此框将使用“Shepard图”替换MDS配置，其中（非度量）MDS配置的拟合优度通过绘制拟合的距离/差异与Kolmogorov-Smirnov不相似性来评估。这个图的标题显示了Kruskal的“压力”参数。根据经验，应力值0, 0.025, 0.05, 0.1和0.2分别表示“完美”，“优秀”，“良好”，“公平”和“差”。

help_logratio.en: Ticking this box plots the U-Th-He data on a bivariate log[Th/He] vs. log[U/He] diagram. Unticking this box produces a U-Th-He ternary diagram.
help_logratio.cn: 选中此框会在双变量log[Th/He] vs. log[U/He]图上绘制U-Th-He数据。取消选中此框会产生一个U-Th-He三元图。

help_showcentralcomp.en: Ticking this box plots the geometric mean ('central') U-Th-He composition and its standard error as a white ellipse.
help_showcentralcomp.cn: 勾选此框将U-Th-He组成的几何平均（中心）投点，并将其标准误差绘制为白色椭圆。

help_transform_evolution.en: Ticking this box plots <sup>234</sup>U/<sup>238</sup>U vs. age. Unticking it plots <sup>234</sup>U/<sup>238</sup>U vs. <sup>230</sup>Th/<sup>238</sup>U.
help_transform_evolution.cn: 选中此项可以绘制<sup>234</sup>U/<sup>238</sup>U与年龄的关系图。取消选中绘制<sup>234</sup>U/<sup>238</sup>U与<sup>230</sup>Th/<sup>238</sup>U的关系图。

help_showhist.en: Ticking this box adds a histogram to the KDE, whose area equals that of the KDE itself, and adds a y-axis with the bin counts.
help_showhist.cn: 选中此框会向KDE曲线添加直方图，其面积等于KDE曲线本身，并添加带有bin计数的y轴。

help_fact.en: Three element vector of scaling factors for the He-Th-U ternary diagram. For example, entering <tt>c(100,10,5)</tt> will multiply the He abundance with 100, the Th abundance with 10 and the He abundance with 5 before re-normalising and plotting on the ternary diagram. The purpose of the re-normalisation is to 'zoom into' the data. Entering <tt>auto</tt> automatically selects scaling factors that place the geometric mean composition of the data at the barycentre of the diagram.
help_fact.cn: He-Th-U三元图中三元素的缩放系数。例如，输入 <tt>c(100,10,5)</tt> 将He丰度乘以100，Th丰度乘以10，He丰度乘以5，然后重新归一化并绘制三元图。重新规范化的目的是“放大”数据。输入 (auto) 会自动选择缩放系数，将数据的几何平均组成置于图表的重心中。

help_classical.en: This box controls whether to use classical (Torgerson/Gower) or non-metric MDS. The latter is recommended except if it leads to degenerate configurations, which may be the case for small datasets.
help_classical.cn: 此框控制着是否使用经典（Torgerson/Gower）还是非度量MDS。建议使用后者，除非它导致退化配置，这可能适用于小型数据集。

help_pchdetritals.en: The single-grain ages may be shown under the KDE plot This can either be a number (1-25) or a single character such as '|','o', '*', '+', '.'. Alternatively, enter <tt>none</tt> to omit the plot character.
help_pchdetritals.cn: 单颗粒年龄可以在KDE曲线图下显示。这可以是数字（1-25）或单个符号，例如“|”，“o”，“*”，“”或“.”。或者，输入 (<tt>none</tt>) 以省略绘图符号。

help_pch.en: The single-grain ages may be shown under the KDE plot This can either be a number (1-25) or a single character such as '|', 'o', '*', '+', or '.'. Alternatively, enter <tt>none</tt> to omit the plot character.
help_pch.cn: 单颗粒年龄可以在KDE曲线图下显示。这可以是数字（1-25）或单个符号，例如“|”，“o”，“*”，“”或“.”。或者，输入 (<tt>none</tt>) 以省略绘图符号。

help_transformation.en: The radial scale of a radial plot displays transformed values. For fission track data using the external detector method the <tt>arcsin</tt> transformation is recommended. For other data the <tt>logarithmic</tt> transformation is usually the most appropriate one, although a <tt>linear</tt> options is also available.
help_transformation.cn: 雷达图的径向刻度显示变换值。对于使用外部探测器法的裂变径迹数据，建议使用 <tt>arcsin</tt>（反正弦）变换。对于其他数据，<tt>logarithmic</tt>（对数）变换通常是最合适的，尽管也可以使用 <tt>linear</tt>（线性）选项。

help_pch_MDS.en: The plot symbols can either be set by a number (1-25), or by a single character such as '|', 'o', '*', '+', or '.'. Alternatively, enter <tt>none</tt> to omit the plot character.
help_pch_MDS.cn: '绘制系统可以使用数字（例如1-25）或单个半角字符（例如 '|', 'o', '*', '+', 或'.')。亦可输入<tt>none</tt>来忽略此项。

help_radial_pch.en: The plot character can either be a number (1-25) or a single character such as '|', 'o', '*', '+', or '.'.
help_radial_pch.cn: 图的字符可以是数字（1-25）或单个符号，例如“|”，“o”，“*”，“”或“.”。

help_sigdig.en: The number of significant digits to which the numerical output should be rounded. For example, if this number is 2, then 1.23456 ± 0.01234 is rounded to 1.234 ± 0.012.
help_sigdig.cn: 应舍入的输出有效数字的位数。例如，如果此数字为2，则1.23456±0.01234舍入为1.234±0.012。

help_U238U235.en: The natural isotopic abundance ratio of uranium and it standard error. Default values are taken from Hiess et al. (2012). To use the IUGS-recommended value of Steiger and Jäger (1977), change this to 137.88 ± 0.
help_U238U235.cn: 铀的天然同位素丰度比及其标准误差。默认值取自Hiess et al. (2012)。要使用IUGS推荐的Steiger和Jäger（1977）的值，请将其更改为137.88±0。

help_headers_on.en: The names of the detrital samples can be specified on the first row of the input table. Otherwise, the corresponding plots will be labeled with the column headers of the table, i.e. the letters <tt>A</tt>, <tt>B</tt>, ... <tt>ZZ</tt>
help_headers_on.cn: 可以在输入表的第一行指定碎屑样品的名称。否则，相应的图将用表的列标题标记，即字母 <tt>A</tt>，<tt>B</tt>，......<tt>ZZ</tt>。

help_mindens.en: The mineral density is needed to convert the uranium concentration from ppm to atoms per unit volume.
help_mindens.cn: 需要矿物密度将铀浓度从ppm转换为每单位体积volume的原子。

help_tracklength.en: The initial track length is needed to convert the surface density (tracks per unit area) into a volume density (tracks per unit volume).
help_tracklength.cn: 需要初始径迹长度来将表面密度（每单位面积的轨道）转换为体积密度（每单位体积的轨道）。

help_cex.en: The factor by which text labels should be magnified relative to the default (which is 1)
help_cex.cn: 文本标签和绘图符号应相对于默认值（即1）放大的系数

help_pcex.en: The factor by which plotting symbols should be magnified relative to the default (which is 1)
help_pcex.cn: '默认绘制符号大小的放大倍数。

help_etchfact.en: The efficiency factor corrects the bias caused by the etching process. The default value for apatite is based on the mean of 3 measurements by Iwano & Danhara (1998) and 1 measurement by Jonckheere (2003).
help_etchfact.cn: 效率系数校正了蚀刻过程引起的偏差。磷灰石的默认值基于Iwano&Danhara (1998)的3次测量和Jonckheere (2003)的1次测量的平均值。

help_ticks.en: The disparity transformation used by the (non-metric) MDS algorithm produces normalised values with no physical meaning. The axes of the MDS configuration can therefore safely be removed, which improves the ink-to-information ratio (sensu Tufte) of the graphical output.
help_ticks.cn: （非度量）MDS算法使用的视差变换产生没有物理意义的归一化值。因此可以安全地移除MDS配置的轴，这改善了图形输出的墨水信息比（sensu Tufte）。

help_LambdaRb87.en: The default values of the <sup>87</sup>Rb decay constant and its standard error are taken from Villa et al. (2015). To use the old IUGS recommended values of Steiger and Jaeger (1977), change to 0.000013972 ± 0.
help_LambdaRb87.cn: <sup>87</sup>Rb衰减常数的默认值及其标准误差取自Villa et al. (2015)。要使用Steiger and Jaeger (1977)的旧IUGS推荐值，请更改为0.000013972±0。

help_LambdaU238.en: The default values of the <sup>238</sup>U decay constant and its standard error are taken from Jaffey et al. (1971).
help_LambdaU238.cn: <sup>238</sup>U衰减常数的默认值及其标准误差取自Jaffey et al. (1971)。

help_LambdaU235.en: The default values of the <sup>235</sup>U decay constant and its standard error are taken from Jaffey et al. (1971).
help_LambdaU235.cn: <sup>235</sup>U衰减常数的默认值及其标准误差取自Jaffey et al. (1971)。

help_LambdaTh232.en: The default values of the <sup>232</sup>Th decay constant and its standard error are taken from Le Roux and Glendenin (1963).
help_LambdaTh232.cn: <sup>232</sup>Th衰减常数的默认值及其标准误差来自Le Roux and Glendenin (1963)。

help_LambdaRe187.en: The default values of the <sup>187</sup>Re decay constant and its standard error are taken from Selby et al. (2007).
help_LambdaRe187.cn: <sup>187</sup>Re衰减常数的默认值及其标准误差取自Selby et al. (2007)。

help_LambdaSm147.en: The default values of the <sup>147</sup>Sm decay constant and its standard error are taken from Lugmair and Marti (1978).
help_LambdaSm147.cn: <sup>147</sup>Sm衰减常数的默认值及其标准误差取自Lugmair and Marti (1978)。

help_LambdaK40.en: The default values for the decay constant of <sup>40</sup>K and its standard error are taken from Renne et al. (2011).
help_LambdaK40.cn: 40K衰减常数的默认值及其标准误差取自Renne et al. (2011)。

help_Ar40Ar36.en: The default values for the atmospheric ('excess') argon ratio and its standard error are taken from Lee et al. (2006).
help_Ar40Ar36.cn: 大气（“过量”）Ar比例及其标准误差的默认值取自Lee et al. (2006)。

help_LambdaU234.en: The default value of the <sup>234</sup>U decay constant is taken from Cheng et al. (2013). Its standard error excludes all covariant sources of analytical uncertainty with <sup>230</sup>Th.
help_LambdaU234.cn: <sup>234</sup>U衰减常数的默认值取自Cheng et al. (2013)。其标准误差排除了<sup>230</sup>Th分析不确定性的所有共变来源。

help_LambdaPa231.en: The default value of the <sup>231</sup>Pa decay constant is taken from Audi et al. (2003).
help_LambdaPa231.cn: <sup>231</sup>Pa衰减常数的默认值及其标准误差来自 Audi et al. (2003)。

help_LambdaTh230.en: The default value of the <sup>230</sup>Th decay constant is taken from Cheng et al. (2013). Its standard error excludes all covariant sources of analytical uncertainty with <sup>234</sup>U.
help_LambdaTh230.cn: <sup>230</sup>Th衰减常数的默认值取自Cheng et al. (2013)。其标准误差排除了<sup>234</sup>U分析不确定性的所有共变来源。

help_LambdaRa226.en: The default value of the <sup>226</sup>Ra decay constant is taken from Audi et al. (2003).
help_LambdaRa226.cn: <sup>226</sup>Ra衰减常数的默认值及其标准误差来自 Audi et al. (2003)。

help_LambdaFission.en: The default value for the fission decay constant is the consensus value of Holden and Hoffman (2000).
help_LambdaFission.cn: 裂变衰变常数的默认值是Holden and Hoffman (2000)的共识值。

help_pch-cad.en: The beginning of each CAD step may be marked by a plot character. This can either be a number (1-25) or a single character such as 'o', '*', or '+'. Alternatively, enter <tt>none</tt> to omit the plot character.
help_pch-cad.cn: 每个CAD步骤的开始可以用绘图字符标记。这可以是数字（1-25）或单个符号，例如“o”，“*”或“”。或者，输入 (<tt>none</tt>) 以省略绘图符号。

help_bandwidth.en: The bandwidth of the KDE affects the smoothness of the density estimate. On linear scales, this value has units of age (in Ma). On a log-scale, the bandwidth is a fractional value. For example, in the latter case, a value of 0.1 indicates a kernel bandwidth that is 10% of the age. Setting the bandwidth to <tt>auto</tt> automatically selects a value based on the algorithm of Botev et al. (2010).
help_bandwidth.cn: KDE曲线的带宽会影响密度估计的平滑度。在线性刻度上，此值具有年龄单位（以Ma为单位）。在对数刻度上，带宽是小数值。例如，在对数刻度上，值为0.1表示内核带宽为年龄的10％。将带宽设置为 (<tt>auto</tt>) 将根据Botev et al. (2010)的算法自动选择一个值。

help_cutoff76.en: The <sup>206</sup>Pb/<sup>238</sup>U-method is more precise than the <sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>206</sup>Pb-method for young ages, while the opposite is true for old ages. This box sets the cutoff age below which the <sup>206</sup>Pb/<sup>238</sup>U-method, and above which the <sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>206</sup>Pb-method should be used.
help_cutoff76.cn: 对于较小的年龄，<sup>206</sup>Pb/<sup>238</sup>U方法比<sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>206</sup>Pb方法更精确，而对于较大的年龄则相反。此框设置临界年龄，小于该年龄使用206Pb/238U方法的年龄结果，老于该年龄应使用<sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>206</sup>Pb方法的年龄结果。

help_clabel.en: Text label for the (optional) colour scale

help_U48_ThU.en: Specify the measured present day <sup>234</sup>U/<sup>238</sup>U activity ratio of the detritus and its standard error.
help_U48_ThU.cn: 指定测量的碎屑现代<sup>234</sup>U/<sup>238</sup>U活度比及其标准误差。

help_Th2U8_ThU.en: Specify the measured present day <sup>232</sup>Th/<sup>238</sup> activity ratio of the detritus and its standard error.
help_Th2U8_ThU.cn: 指定测量的碎屑现代<sup>232</sup>Th/<sup>238</sup>U活度比及其标准误差。

help_Th0U8_ThU.en: Specify the measured present day <sup>230</sup>Th/<sup>238</sup>U activity ratio of the detritus and its standard error.
help_Th0U8_ThU.cn: 指定测量的碎屑现代<sup>230</sup>Th/<sup>238</sup>U活度比及其标准误差。

help_Pb208Pb206.en: Specify the initial <sup>208</sup>Pb/<sup>206</sup>Pb-ratio to be used in a nominal common Pb correction or anchored discordia line regression. The default value corresponds to the troilite  composition of Stacey and Kramers (1975).
help_Pb208Pb206.cn: 指定在标称普通Pb校正或固定不一致线回归中使用的初始<sup>208</sup>Pb/<sup>206</sup>Pb比值。默认值对应于Stacey and Kramers (1975)的陨硫铁组成。

help_Pb208Pb207.en: Specify the initial <sup>208</sup>Pb/<sup>206</sup>Pb-ratio to be used in a nominal common Pb correction or anchored discordia line regression. The default value corresponds to the troilite  composition of Stacey and Kramers (1975).
help_Pb208Pb207.cn: 指定在标称普通Pb校正或固定不一致线回归中使用的初始<sup>208</sup>Pb/<sup>207</sup>Pb比值。默认值对应于Stacey and Kramers (1975)的陨硫铁组成。

help_Pb207Pb206.en: Specify the initial <sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>206</sup>Pb-ratio to be used in a nominal common Pb correction or anchored discordia line regression. The default value corresponds to the troilite  composition of Stacey and Kramers (1975).

help_colmap.en: Specify one of the following colour palettes: <tt>rainbow</tt>, <tt>cm.colors</tt>, <tt>topo.colors</tt>, <tt>terrain.colors</tt>, or <tt>heat.colors</tt>.
help_colmap.cn: 指定以下调色板之一：<tt>rainbow</tt>, <tt>cm.colors</tt>, <tt>topo.colors</tt>, <tt>terrain.colors</tt> 或 <tt>heat.colors</tt>。

help_show_p.en:
Show the p-value for concordance for each aliquot to the output table. Note: it would be unwise to use the p-value value as a concordance filter. Doing so would 'punish' high precision measurements, 
which are more likely to fail the Chi-square test than low precision measurements. The latter would therefore be 'rewarded' by such a criterion.
help_show_p.cn: 显示输出表中每个样品的一致性的p值。注意：使用p值作为一致性过滤器是不明智的。这样做会“惩罚”高精度测量，这种测量比低精度测量更有可能使卡方测试失败。因此，后者将被这样的标准“奖励”。

help_alpha.en: Set the probability cutoff (α) for error ellipses, and 100(1-α)% confidence intervals.
help_alpha.cn: 设置误差椭圆的概率临界值（α）和100(1-α)%置信区间。

help_mint_evolution.en: Set the minimum Th-U age limit for the evolution diagram. Type <tt>auto</tt> to have <tt>IsoplotR</tt> automatically set a suitable value.
help_mint_evolution.cn: 设置演化图的最小Th-U年龄。输入(<tt>auto</tt>)使<tt>IsoplotR</tt>自动设置合适的值。

help_mint_average.en: Set the minimum age limit for the y-axis of the weighted mean plot. Type <tt>auto</tt> to have  <tt>IsoplotR</tt> automatically set a suitable value.

help_mineral_option.en: Selecting a mineral (apatite or zircon) loads a set of suggested values for the density, track length and efficiency factor. It is, of course, possible to change these if necessary.
help_mineral_option.cn: 选择矿物（磷灰石或锆石）会加载一组密度，轨道长度和效率系数的建议值。如有必要，可以更改这些值。

help_conc_age_option.en:
Select the option to either
  • plot the data without calculating an age
  • fit a concordia composition and age
  • fit a discordia line through the data using the maximum likelihood algorithm of Ludwig (1998), which assumes that the scatter of the data is solely due to the analytical uncertainties. In this case, IsoplotR will either calculate an upper and lower intercept age (for Wetherill concordia), or a lower intercept age and common (207Pb/206Pb)o-ratio intercept (for Tera-Wasserburg). If MSWD>0, then the analytical uncertainties are augmented by a factor √MSWD.
  • fit a discordia line ignoring the analytical uncertainties
  • fit a discordia line using a modified maximum likelihood algorithm that includes accounts for any overdispersion by adding a geological (co)variance term.
help_conc_age_option.cn:
• 在不计算年龄的情况下绘制数据
  • 拟合谐和曲线组成和年龄
  • 使用Ludwig (1998)的最大似然算法拟合数据的不一致线，该算法假设数据的分散仅仅是由于分析的不确定性导致。IsoplotR将计算上下截距年龄（对于Wetheril谐和曲线），或者较低截距年龄和常见(207Pb/206Pb)O比率截距（对于Tera-Wasserburg）。如果MSWD>0，则通过√MSWD系数增加分析不确定性。
  • 拟合不协和线时忽略分析不确定度
  • 使用修改的最大似然算法拟合不和谐线，该算法包括通过添加地质（协）方差项来解释任何过度离散。

help_anchor_option.en:
Select an option to either
  1. Fit the discordia line without external constraints
  2. Anchor the discordia line to a particular age
  3. Anchor the discordia line to a particular common Pb composition
help_anchor_option.cn:
选择任一选项
  1. 在没有外部约束的情况下拟合不和谐线
  2. 将不和谐线固定到特定年龄
  3. 将不和谐线固定到特定的普通Pb组成上

help_mixtures.en: Peak fitting using the algorithms of Galbraith and Green (1990). Assumes that the data are underlain by a true age distribution consisting of a finite number (1-5) of discrete age peaks. 'auto'-setting uses the Bayes Information Criterion (BIC) to pick a parsimonous number of components. Note that the number of peaks tends to increase with sample size! The 'minimum'-setting assumes that the true age distribution is a truncated Normal with a discrete component at its lowest, truncated end.
help_mixtures.cn: Galbraith and Green (1990)的算法进行峰拟合。假设数据由真实的年龄分布承担，该年龄分布由有限数量（1-5）的离散年龄峰组成。'auto'-设置使用贝叶斯信息准则（BIC）来挑选大量的组件。请注意，随着样本量的增加，峰的数量会增加！'minimum'-设置假设真实年龄分布是截断的正态，其最低截断端具有离散分量。

help_col.en: Outline colour for the plot symbols (e.g.,<tt>black</tt>, <tt>red</tt>, <tt>green</tt>).

help_discordance_filter.en: One of the great strengths of the U-Pb method is its ability to detect disruptions of the isotopic clock by Pb-loss by comparing the degree of concordance between the <sup>206</sup>Pb/<sup>238</sup>U- and <sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>235</sup>U-clocks , or between the <sup>206</sup>Pb/<sup>238</sup>U- and <sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>206</sup>Pb-clocks. A discordance filter can be applied either before or after the common-Pb correction (in any). The former option is particularly useful for datasets lacking <sup>204</sup>Pb.
help_discordance_filter.cn: U-Pb方法的一大优势是它能够通过比较<sup>206</sup>Pb/<sup>238</sup>U-时钟和<sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>235</sup>U-时钟之间或<sup>206</sup>Pb/<sup>238</sup>U-时钟和<sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>206</sup>Pb-时钟之间的一致性程度来检测Pb损失对同位素时钟的破坏。可以在普通Pb校正之前或之后（在任何情况下）应用不一致滤波器。前一个选项对缺少<sup>204</sup>Pb的数据集特别有用。

help_binwidth.en: On linear scales, the histogram binwidth has units of age (in Ma). On a log-scale, the binwidth is a fractional value. For example, in the latter case, a value of 0.1 indicates a histogram binwidth that is 10% of the age. Setting the binwidth to <tt>auto</tt> automatically sets the number of bins according to to Sturges' Rule, i.e. N=log<sub>2</sub>(n)+1, where n is the number of ages and N is the number of bins.
help_binwidth.cn: 在线性标度上，直方图矩形宽度具有年龄单位（以Ma为单位）。在对数刻度上，binwidth是小数值。例如，在对数刻度中，值0.1表示直方图矩形宽度，其为年龄的10％。将矩形宽度设置为 (<tt>auto</tt>) 会根据Sturges’ Rule自动设置直方图矩形的数量，即N = log<sup>2</sup>(n)+1，其中n是年龄，N是矩形数。

help_minx-helioplot.en: Minimum log[U/He] limit. Setting this to <tt>auto</tt> automatically sets this value to fit all the data.
help_minx-helioplot.cn: 最小log[U/He]限制。将此值设置为 (<tt>auto</tt>) 会自动设置此值以适合所有数据。

help_miny_helioplot.en: Minimum log[Th/He] limit. Setting this to <tt>auto</tt> automatically sets this value to fit all the data.
help_miny_helioplot.cn: 最小log[Th/He]限制。将此值设置为(<tt>auto</tt>)会自动设置此值以适合所有数据。

help_isochron_miny.en: Minimum limit of the vertical axis. Type <tt>auto</tt> to have <tt>IsoplotR</tt> automatically set a suitable value.
help_isochron_miny.cn: 垂直轴的最小值。输入(<tt>auto</tt>)使<tt>IsoplotR</tt>自动设置合适的值。

help_miny_concordia.en: Minimum limit of the vertical axis. Type <tt>auto</tt> to have <tt>IsoplotR</tt> automatically set a suitable value.

help_isochron_minx.en: Minimum limit of the horizontal axis. Type <tt>auto</tt> to have <tt>IsoplotR</tt> automatically set a suitable value.

help_minx_concordia.en: Minimum limit of the horizontal axis. Type <tt>auto</tt> to have <tt>IsoplotR</tt> automatically set a suitable value.

help_minx.en: Minimum age constraint of the KDE. Setting this to <tt>auto</tt> automatically sets this value to include the smallest value in the dataset.

help_maxy_concordia.en: Maximum limit of the vertical axis. Type <tt>auto</tt> to have <tt>IsoplotR</tt> automatically set a suitable value.

help_outliers.en: If checked, applies a generalised Chauvenet Criterion to reject outliers and remove them from the weighted mean.
help_outliers.cn: 若选中，则应用广义肖维勒准则（generalised Chauvenet Criterion）来拒绝异常值并将其从加权平均值中删除。

help_plateau.en: If checked, <tt>IsoplotR</tt> computes the weighted mean of the longest succession of steps that pass the generalised Chauvenet Criterion for outliers, and marks the steps belonging to this plateau in a different colour.
help_plateau.cn: 如果选中，<tt>IsoplotR</tt>会计算通过异常值的广义肖维勒准则（generalised Chauvenet Criterion）的最长连续步骤的加权平均值，并以不同颜色标记属于此平台的步骤。

help_isochron_evolution.en: Fit an isochron through the data using the algorithm of Ludwig and Titterington (1994)?
help_isochron_evolution.cn: 使用Ludwig和Titterington（1994）的算法通过数据拟合等时线

help_bg.en:
Fill colour for the plot symbols. This can either be a single colour or multiple colours to form a colour ramp:
  1. single colour: '#FF000080', '#808080', rgb(0,1,0,0.5), rgb(0.5,1,0.5), 'white', 'red', 'blue', ...
  2. multiple colours: c('#FF000080','#00FF0080'), c(rbg(1,0,0,0.5),rgb(0,1,0,0.5)), c('blue','red'), c('blue','yellow','red','white'), ...
  3. a colour palette: rainbow(n=100), topo.colors(n=100,alpha=0.5), terrain.colors(n=256), heat.colors(n=10,alpha=0.8), cm.colors(n=10,alpha=0.5), ...
  4. reversed palettes: rev(rainbow(n=100)), rev(topo.colors(n=100,alpha=0.5)), ...
Enter NA for empty plot symbols.
help_bg.cn:
填充绘图符号的颜色。可以是单色，或多种颜色以形成颜色渐变：
  1. 单色：'＃FF000080', '＃808080', rgb(0,1,0,0.5), rgb(0.5,1,0.5), 'white', 'red', 'blue', ...
  2. 多种颜色：c('＃FF000080', '＃00FF0080'), c(rbg(1,0,0,0.5), rgb(0,1,0,0.5)), c('blue', 'red'), c('blue', 'yellow', 'red', 'white'), ...
  3. 调色板：rainbow(n = 100), topo.colors(n = 100, alpha = 0.5), terrain.colors(n = 256), heat.colors(n = 10, alpha = 0.8), cm.colors(n = 10, alpha = 0.5), ...
  4. 反转调色板：rev(rainbow(n=100)), rev(topo.colors(n=100, alpha=0.5)), ...
输入 (NA) 则不填充绘图符号。

help_ellipse_col.en:
Fill colour for the error ellipses. This can either be a single colour or multiple colours to form a colour ramp:
  1. single colour: '#FF000080', '#808080', rgb(0,1,0,0.5), rgb(0.5,1,0.5), 'white', 'red', 'blue', ...
  2. multiple colours: c('#FF000080','#00FF0080'), c(rbg(1,0,0,0.5),rgb(0,1,0,0.5)), c('blue','red'), c('blue','yellow','red','white'), ...
  3. a colour palette: rainbow(n=100), topo.colors(n=100,alpha=0.5), terrain.colors(n=256), heat.colors(n=10,alpha=0.8), cm.colors(n=10,alpha=0.5), ...
  4. reversed palettes: rev(rainbow(n=100)), rev(topo.colors(n=100,alpha=0.5)), ...
Enter NA for empty error ellipses.
help_ellipse_col.cn:
填充误差椭圆的颜色。可以是单色，或多种颜色以形成颜色渐变：
  1. 单色：'＃FF000080', '＃808080', rgb(0,1,0,0.5), rgb(0.5,1,0.5), 'white', 'red', 'blue', ...
  2. 多种颜色：c('＃FF000080', '＃00FF0080'), c(rbg(1,0,0,0.5), rgb(0,1,0,0.5)), c('blue', 'red'), c('blue', 'yellow', 'red', 'white'), ...
  3. 调色板：rainbow(n = 100), topo.colors(n = 100, alpha = 0.5), terrain.colors(n = 256), heat.colors(n = 10, alpha = 0.8), cm.colors(n = 10, alpha = 0.5), ...
  4. 反转调色板：rev(rainbow(n=100)), rev(topo.colors(n=100, alpha=0.5)), ...
输入 (NA) 则不填充误差椭圆。

help_concordia_ticks.en: Comma-separated list of custom age ticks for the concordia line.
help_concordia_ticks.cn: 谐和曲线的自定义年龄刻度的逗号分隔列表。

help_regression_format.en:
Choose one of two input formats:
  1. X, err[X], Y, err[Y], rho
    where X and Y are two sets of measurements, err[X] and err[Y]are their respective uncertainties and rho the error correlation.
  2. X/Z, err[X/Z], Y/Z, err[Y/Z], X/Y, err[X/Y]
    in which the redundancy between the three error estimates allows the correlation coefficient between X/Z and Y/Z to be computed.
help_regression_format.cn:
选择以下两种输入格式之一：
  1. X, err[X], Y, err[Y], rho
    其中X和Y是两组测量值，err[X]和err[Y]是它们各自的不确定性，并且rho是误差相关性。
  2. X/Z, err[X/Z], Y/Z, err[Y/Z], X/Y, err[X/Y]
    其中三个误差估计之间的冗余允许计算X / Z和Y / Z之间的相关系数。

help_UPb_isochron_types.en:
Choose one of two input formats:
  1. 204Pb/206Pb208Pbo/206Pb vs. 238U/206Pb
  2. 204Pb/207Pb208Pbo/207Pb vs. 235U/207Pb
Where 208Pbo is the (inferred) non-radiogenic 208Pb-component.
help_UPb_isochron_types.cn:
'使用以下输入格式的一种:
  1. 204Pb/206Pb208Pbo/206Pb vs. 238U/206Pb
  2. 204Pb/207Pb208Pbo/207Pb vs. 235U/207Pb
其中 208Pbo 为非放射性成因的铅成分。

help_isochron_models.en:
Choose one of three regression models:
  1. Maximum Likelihood regression, using either the modified error weighted least squares algorithm of York et al. (2004) for 2-dimensional data, or the Maximum Likelihood formulation of Ludwig and Titterington (1994) for 3-dimensional data. These algorithms take into account the analytical uncertainties and error correlations, under the assumption that the scatter between the data points is solely caused by the analytical uncertainty. If the assumption is correct, then the MSWD value should be approximately equal to one. There are three strategies to deal with the case where MSWD>1. The first of these is to assume that the analytical uncertainties have been underestimated by a factor √MSWD. Alternative approaches are described below.
  2. Ordinary least squares regression: A second way to deal with over- or underdispersed datasets is to simply ignore the analytical uncertainties.
  3. Maximum likelihood regression with overdispersion: Instead of attributing any overdispersion (MSWD > 1) to underestimated analytical uncertainties (model 1), one can also attribute it to the presence of geological uncertainty, which manifests itself as an added (co)variance term.
help_isochron_models.cn:
1. 最大似然回归，使用York et al. (2004)的用于二维数据的修正误差加权最小二乘算法，或者使用Ludwig and Titterington (1994)的三维数据的最大似然公式。在假设数据点之间的分散仅由分析不确定性引起的情况下，这些算法考虑了分析不确定性和误差相关性。如果假设是正确的，那么MSWD值应大约等于1。有三种策略可以解决MSWD> 1的问题。第一个是假设分析不确定性被√MSWD因子低估了。替代方法如下所述。
  2. 普通最小二乘回归：处理过度离散或低离散（over- and underdispersed）数据集的第二种方法是简单地忽略分析不确定性。
  3. 过度离散的最大似然回归：可以将任何过度离散（MSWD> 1）归因于地质不确定性，而非低估的分析不确定性（模型1），而地质不确定性表现为增加的（协）方差项。

help_SmNd_formats.en:
Choose one of three input formats:
  1. X=Sm147/Nd144 err[X] Y=Nd143/Nd144 err[Y] (rho)
    where rho is the (optional) error correlation between Sm147/Nd144 and Nd143/Nd144
  2. X=Sm147/Nd143 err[X] Y=Nd144/Nd143 err[Y] (rho)
    where rho is the (optional) error correlation between Sm147/Nd143 and Nd144/Nd143
  3. Sm err[Sm] Nd err[Nd] 143/144 err[143/144]
    where Sm and Nd are in ppm.
help_SmNd_formats.cn:
选择以下三种输入格式之一：
  1. X=Sm147/Nd144 err[X] Y=Nd143/Nd144 err[Y] (rho)
    其中rho是Sm147/Nd144和Nd143/Nd144之间的（可选）误差相关性。
  2. X=Sm147/Nd143 err[X] Y=Nd144/Nd143 err[Y] (rho)
    其中rho是Sm147/Nd143和Nd144/Nd143之间的（可选）误差相关性。
  3. Sm err[Sm] Nd err[Nd] 143/144 err[143/144]
    其中Sm和Nd以ppm为单位。

help_ReOs_formats.en:
Choose one of three input formats:
  1. X=Re187/Os188 err[X] Y=Os187/Os188 err[Y] (rho)
    where rho is the (optional) error correlation between Re187/Os188 and Os187/Os188
  2. X=Re187/Os187 err[X] Y=Os188/Os187 err[Y] (rho)
    where rho is the (optional) error correlation between Re187/Os187 and Os188/Os187
  3. Re err[Re] Os err[Os] 187/188 err[187/188]
    where Re and Os are in ppm.
help_ReOs_formats.cn:
选择以下三种输入格式之一：
  1. X=Re187/Os188 err[X] Y=Os187/Os188 err[Y] (rho)
    其中rho是Re187/Os188和Os187/Os188之间的（可选）误差相关性。
  2. X=Re187/Os187 err[X] Y=Os188/Os187 err[Y] (rho)
    其中rho是Re187/Os187和Os188/Os187之间的（可选）误差相关性。
  3. Re err[Re] Os err[Os] 187/188 err[187/188]
    其中Re和Os以ppm为单位。

help_RbSr_formats.en:
Choose one of three input formats:
  1. X=Rb87/Sr86 err[X] Y=Sr87/Sr86 err[Y] (rho)
    where rho is the (optional) error correlation between Rb87/Sr86 and Sr87/Sr86
  2. X=Rb87/Sr87 err[X] Y=Sr86/Sr87 err[Y] (rho)
    where rho is the (optional) error correlation between Rb86/Sr87 and Sr86/Sr87
  3. Rb err[Rb] Sr err[Sr] 87/86 err[87/86]
    where Rb and Sr are in ppm.
help_RbSr_formats.cn:
选择以下三种输入格式之一：
  1. X=Rb87/Sr86 err[X] Y=Sr87/Sr86 err[Y] (rho)
    其中rho是Rb87/Sr86和Sr87/Sr86之间的（可选）误差相关性。
  2. X=Rb87/Sr87 err[X] Y=Sr86/Sr87 err[Y] (rho)
    其中rho是Rb86/Sr87和Sr86/Sr87之间的（可选）误差相关性。
  3. Rb err[Rb] Sr err[Sr] 87/86 err[87/86]
    其中Rb和Sr以ppm为单位。

help_LuHf_formats.en:
Choose one of three input formats:
  1. X=Lu176/Hf177 err[X] Y=Hf176/Hf177 err[Y] (rho)
    where rho is the (optional) error correlation between Lu176/Hf177 and Hf176/Hf177
  2. X=Lu176/Hf176 err[X] Y=Hf177/Hf176 err[Y] (rho)
    where rho is the (optional) error correlation between Lu177/Hf176 and Hf177/Hf176
  3. Lu err[Lu] Hf err[Hf] 176/177 err[176/177]
    where Lu and Hf are in ppm.
help_LuHf_formats.cn:
选择以下三种输入格式之一：
  1. X=Lu176/Hf177 err[X] Y=Hf176/Hf177 err[Y] (rho)
    其中rho是Lu176/Hf177和Hf176/Hf177之间的（可选）误差相关性。
  2. X=Lu176/Hf176 err[X] Y=Hf177/Hf176 err[Y] (rho)
    其中rho是Lu177/Hf176和Hf177/Hf176之间的（可选）误差相关性。
  3. Lu err[Lu] Hf err[Hf] 176/177 err[176/177] 其中Lu和Hf以ppm为单位。

help_KCa_formats.en:
Choose one of three input formats:
  1. X err[X] Y err[Y] rho
    where X is the 40K/44Ca ratio, Y is the 40Ca/44Ca ratio, and err[X], err[Y] and rho are the uncertainties and error correlations, respectively.
  2. X err[X] Y err[Y] rho
    where X is the 40K/40Ca ratio, Y is the 44Ca/40Ca ratio, and err[X], err[Y] and rho are the uncertainties and error correlations, respectively.
  3. X err[X] Y err[Y] Z err[Z]
    where X, err[X], Y, and err[Y] are defined as in option 1, Z is the 40K/40Ca ratio, and err[Z] is its uncertainty. Here the redundancy between three ratio uncertainties allows the covariance to be determined implicitly.
help_KCa_formats.cn:
选择以下三种输入格式之一：
  1. X err[X] Y err[Y] rho
    其中X是40K/44Ca比值，Y是40Ca/44Ca比值，并且err[X]，err[Y]和rho分别是不确定性和误差相关性。
  2. X err[X] Y err[Y] rho
    其中X是40K/40Ca比值，Y是44Ca/40Ca比值，并且err[X]，err[Y]和rho分别是不确定性和误差相关性。
  3. X err[X] Y err[Y] Z err[Z]
    其中X，err[X]，Y和err[Y]定义如选项1，Z是40K/40Ca比率，err[Z]是其不确定性。在这里三个比值不确定性之间的冗余允许暗中确定协方差。

help_PbPb_formats.en:
Choose one of three input formats:
  1. 6/4 err[6/4] 7/4 err[7/4] rho
    where rho is the error correlation between 6/4 and 7/4.
  2. 4/6 err[4/6] 7/6 err[7/6] (rho)
    where the error correlation is optional.
  3. 6/4 err[6/4] 7/4 err[7/4] 7/6 err[7/6]
    in which the error correlations are calculated from the redundancies between the three sets of uncertainties.
help_PbPb_formats.cn:
选择以下三种输入格式之一：
  1. 6/4 err[6/4] 7/4 err[7/4] rho
    其中rho是6/4和7/4之间的误差相关性。
  2. 4/6 err[4/6] 7/6 err[7/6] (rho)
    其中误差相关性是可选的。
  3. 6/4 err[6/4] 7/4 err[7/4] 7/6 err[7/6]
    其中误差相关性是根据三组不确定性之间的冗余计算的。

help_ArAr_formats.en:
Choose one of three input formats:
  1. 39/36 err[39/36] 40/36 err[40/36] rho (39)
    where rho is the error correlation between 39/36 and 40/36 and (39) is the (optional) amount of 39Ar.
  2. 39/40 err[39/40] 36/40 err[36/40] (rho) (39)
    where the error correlation is optional.
  3. 39/40 err[39/40] 36/40 err[36/40] 39/36 err[39/36] (39)
    in which the error correlations are calculated from the redundancies between the three sets of uncertainties.
help_ArAr_formats.cn:
选择以下三种输入格式之一：
  1. 39/36 err[39/36] 40/36 err[40/36] rho (39)
    其中rho是39/36和40/36之间的误差相关，而（39）是（可选）39Ar的量。
  2. 39/40 err[39/40] 36/40 err[36/40] (rho) (39) 其中误差相关性是可选的。
  3. 39/40 err[39/40] 36/40 err[36/40] 39/36 err[39/36] (39)
    其中误差相关性是根据三组不确定性之间的冗余计算的。

help_FT_formats.cn:
'使用以下几种裂变径迹定年方法：
  1. 'EDM' = 外部探测器法：使用云母探测器记录的中子激发径迹间接测定样品的铀含量；
  2. 'ICP (ζ)': 使用LA-ICP-MS直接测量铀含量，此时使用一个所有测量都标准化到年龄标准的zeta矫正法；
  3. 'ICP (absolute)': 在没有年龄标准情况下使用LA-ICP-MS直接测量铀含量，假定已有足够准确的裂变衰变常数，蚀刻效率系数，以及铀浓度。

help_helioplot_models.en:
Choose one of the following statistical models:
  1. Weighted mean: This model assumes that the scatter between the data points is solely caused by the analytical uncertainty. If the assumption is correct, then the MSWD value should be approximately equal to one. There are three strategies to deal with the case where MSWD>1. The first of these is to assume that the analytical uncertainties have been underestimated by a factor √MSWD. Alternative approaches are described below.
  2. Unweighted mean: A second way to deal with over- or underdispersed datasets is to simply ignore the analytical uncertainties.
  3. Weighted mean with overdispersion: Instead of attributing any overdispersion (MSWD > 1) to underestimated analytical uncertainties (model 1), one could also attribute it to the presence of geological uncertainty, which manifests itself as an added (co)variance term.
help_helioplot_models.cn:
选择以下统计模型之一：
  1. 加权平均值：该模型假设数据点之间的分散仅由分析不确定性引起。如果假设是正确的，那么MSWD值应大约等于1。有三种策略可以解决MSWD> 1的问题。第一个是假设分析不确定性被√MSWD因子低估了。替代方法如下所述。
  2. 未加权平均值：处理过度离散或低离散（over- and underdispersed）数据集的第二种方法是简单地忽略分析不确定性。
  3. 具有过度离散的加权平均值：可以将其归因于地质不确定性的存在，而不是将任何过度离散（MSWD> 1）归因于低估的分析不确定性（模型1），而地质不确定性表现为增加的（共同）方差项。

help_ierr.en:
Choose one of the following four options:
  1. absolute uncertainties at 1σ
  2. absolute uncertainties at 2σ
  3. relative uncertainties (in %) at 1σ
  4. relative uncertainties (in %) at 2σ
help_ierr.cn:
选择以下四个选项之一
  1. 绝对不确定度为1σ
  2. 绝对不确定度为2σ
  3. 相对不确定度(%)为1σ
  4. 相对不确定度(%)为2σ

help_detritus.en:
Choose one of four ways of dealing with detrital 230Th (and 234U):
  1. Do not apply a detrital 230Th correction
  2. Obtain the detrital component by isochron regression
  3. Specify an assumed initial 230Th/232Th-ratio
  4. Provide the measured 230Th-232Th-234U-238U composition of the detritus
help_detritus.cn:
从以下四种方法中选择一种以处理碎屑230Th（和234U）：
  1. 不要使用碎屑230Th校正
  2. 通过等时线回归获得碎屑成分
  3. 指定一个假定的初始230Th/232Th比值
  4. 提供测得的碎屑230Th-232Th-234U-238U组成

help_ThU_isochron_types.en:
Choose one of four input formats:
  1. 230Th/232Th vs. 238U/232Th (Rosholt type 2a)
  2. 230Th/238U vs. 232Th/238U (Osmond type 2a)
  3. 234U/232Th vs. 238U/232Th (Rosholt type 2b)
  4. 234U/238U vs. 232Th/238U (Osmond type 2b)
help_ThU_isochron_types.cn:
选择以下三种裂变径迹测年方法之一：
  1. 230Th/232Th vs. 238U/232Th (Rosholt type 2a)
  2. 230Th/238U vs. 232Th/238U (Osmond type 2a)
  3. 234U/232Th vs. 238U/232Th (Rosholt type 2b)
  4. 234U/238U vs. 232Th/238U (Osmond type 2b)

help_ThU_formats.en:
Choose one of four input formats:
  1. X=8/2 err[8/2] Y=4/2 err[4/2] Z=0/2 err[0/2] rho[X,Y] rho[X,Z] rho[Y,Z]
  2. X=2/8 err[2/8] Y=4/8 err[4/8] Z=0/8 err[0/8] rho[X,Y] rho[X,Z] rho[Y,Z]
  3. 8/2 err[8/2] 0/2 err[0/2] (rho)
    where the error correlation is optional
  4. 2/8 err[2/8] 0/8 err[0/8] (rho)
    where the error correlation is optional
help_ThU_formats.cn:
选择以下四种输入格式之一：
  1. X=8/2 err[8/2] Y=4/2 err[4/2] Z=0/2 err[0/2] rho[X,Y] rho[X,Z] rho[Y,Z]
  2. X=2/8 err[2/8] Y=4/8 err[4/8] Z=0/8 err[0/8] rho[X,Y] rho[X,Z] rho[Y,Z]
  3. 8/2 err[8/2] 0/2 err[0/2] (rho)
    其中误差相关性是可选的。
  4. 2/8 err[2/8] 0/8 err[0/8] (rho)
    其中误差相关性是可选的。

help_UPb_age_type.en:
Choose one of five options:
  1. Plot the 207Pb/235U-ages
  2. Plot the 206Pb/238U-ages
  3. Plot the 207Pb/206Pb-ages
  4. Plot young grains as 206Pb/238U and old grains as 207Pb/206Pb
  5. Plot the single-grain concordia ages.
  6. Plot the 208Pb/232Th-ages
help_UPb_age_type.cn:
选择以下五个选项之一：
  1. 绘制207Pb/235U年龄
  2. 绘制206Pb/238U年龄
  3. 绘制207Pb/206Pb年龄
  4. 以206Pb/238U绘制年龄小的颗粒，以207Pb/206Pb绘制年龄大的颗粒。
  5. 绘制单颗粒的谐和年龄
  6. 绘制208Pb/232Th年龄

help_UPb_formats.en:
Choose one of eight input formats:
  1. X=07/35 err[X] Y=06/38 err[Y] rho
    where 07/35 stands for the 207Pb/235U ratio, 06/38 for the 206Pb/235U ratio and rho is the error correlation between X and Y
  2. X=38/06 err[X] Y=07/06 err[Y] (rho)
    where the error correlation is optional
  3. X=07/06 err[X] Y=06/38 err[Y] Z=07/35 err[Z]
    in which the error correlations are calculated from the redundancies between the three sets of uncertainties.
  4. X=07/35 err[X] Y=06/38 err[Y] Z=04/38 err[Z] rho[X,Y] rho[X,Z] rho[Y,Z]
  5. X=38/06 err[38/06] Y=07/06 err[Y] Z=04/06 err[Z] rho[X,Y] rho[X,Z] rho[Y,Z]
  6. U=07/35 err[U] V=06/38 err[V] W=04/38 err[W] X=07/06 err[X] Y=04/07 err[Y] Z=04/06 err[Z]
    in which the error correlations are calculated from the redundancies between the six sets of uncertainties.
  7. W=07/35 err[W] X=06/38 err[X] Y=08/32 err[Y] Z=32/38 err[Z] rhoWX rhoWY rhoWZ rhoXY rhoXZ rhoYZ
    where 32 stands for 232Th and 08 for 208Pb
  8. W=38/06 err[W] X=07/06 err[X] Y=08/06 err[Y] Z=32/38 err[Z] rhoWX rhoWY rhoWZ rhoXY rhoXZ rhoYZ
help_UPb_formats.cn:
1. X=07/35 err[X] Y=06/38 err[Y] rho
    其中07/35代表207Pb/235U比率，06/38代表206Pb/235U比率，rho代表X和Y之间的误差相关性。
  2. X=38/06 err[X] Y=07/06 err[Y] (rho) 其中误差相关性是可选的。
  3. X=07/06 err[X] Y=06/38 err[Y] Z=07/35 err[Z]
    其中误差相关性是根据三组不确定性之间的冗余计算的。
  4. X=07/35 err[X] Y=06/38 err[Y] Z=04/38 err[Z] rho[X,Y] rho[X,Z] rho[Y,Z]
  5. X=38/06 err[38/06] Y=07/06 err[Y] Z=04/06 err[Z] rho[X,Y] rho[X,Z] rho[Y,Z]
  6. U=07/35 err[U] V=06/38 err[V] W=04/38 err[W] X=07/06 err[X] Y=04/07 err[Y] Z=04/06 err[Z]
    其中误差相关性是根据六组不确定性之间的冗余计算的。
  7. W=07/35 err[W] X=06/38 err[X] Y=08/32 err[Y] Z=32/38 err[Z] rhoWX rhoWY rhoWZ rhoXY rhoXZ rhoYZ
    其中32代表232Th，08代表208Pb
  8. W=38/06 err[W] X=07/06 err[X] Y=08/06 err[Y] Z=32/38 err[Z] rhoWX rhoWY rhoWZ rhoXY rhoXZ rhoYZ

help_Os187Os192.en: Change the initial <sup>187</sup>Os/<sup>192</sup>Os ratio and its standard error. This value is only used to calculate ages if the isochron option has been switched off. The default ratio is taken from Voelkening et al. (1991).
help_Os187Os192.cn: 更改初始<sup>187</sup>Os/<sup>192</sup>Os比值及其标准误差。如果已关闭等时线选项，则此值仅用于计算年龄。默认比值取自Voelkening et al. (1991)。

help_mindisc.en: By default, the <sup>206</sup>Pb/<sup>238</sup>U-age is allowed to be 15% younger than the <sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>206</sup>Pb- (or <sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>235</sup>U)-age. Different values can be set in this box.
help_mindisc.cn: 默认情况下，<sup>206</sup>Pb/<sup>238</sup>U年龄可以比<sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>206</sup>Pb（或<sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>235</sup>U）年龄小15％。可以在此框中设置不同的值。

help_maxdisc.en: By default, the <sup>206</sup>Pb/<sup>238</sup>U-age  is allowed to be 5% older than the <sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>206</sup>Pb-  (or <sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>235</sup>U)-age.  Different values can be set in this box.
help_maxdisc.cn: 默认情况下，<sup>206</sup>Pb/<sup>238</sup>U年龄可以比<sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>206</sup>Pb（或<sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>235</sup>U）年龄大5％。可以在此框中设置不同的值。

help_ranked.en: Arrange the measurements in order of increasing value?

help_diseq.en:
Apply a secular disequilibrium correction to the U-Pb data, based on:
  1. the initial 234U/238U, 230Th/238U, 226Ra/238U and 231Pa/235U activity ratios of the sample or (equivalently) the Th/U, Ra/U and Pa/U fractionation factors between the sample and the parent magma; or
  2. the current 234U/238U or 230Th/238U activity ratios of the sample.
  3. alternatively, the Th/U fractionation factor can also be calculated from the measured Th/U ratio of the magma. This can be determined from the whole rock and or volcanic glass.
help_diseq.cn:
根据以下因素对U-Pb数据应用长期不平衡校正：
  1. 样品初始的234U/238U, 230Th/238U, 226Ra/238U以及231Pa/235U活度比。
  2. 样品目前的234U/238U, 230Th/238U, 226Ra/238U以及231Pa/235U活度比。
  3. 形成样品的矿物和岩浆之间的Th/U，Ra/U和Pa/U的分馏系数。
  4. 测得的岩浆的Th/U比值，该值通过整个岩石或火山玻璃的地球化学分析确定。将该测得的比值连同矿物的232Th/238U比值可计算Th/U分馏系数。

help_U48_UPb.en: Apply a secular disequilibrium correction to the U-Pb data, based on the the initial or measured <sup>234</sup>U/<sup>238</sup>U activity ratio
help_U48_UPb.cn: 指定样品的（初始或测量的）<sup>234</sup>U/<sup>238</sup>U活度比。1.15是现代海水的标准值。

help_PaU_UPb.en: Apply a secular disequilibrium correction to the U-Pb data, based on the the initial <sup>231</sup>Pa/<sup>235</sup>U activity ratio
help_PaU_UPb.cn: 指定样品的（初始或测量的）<sup>231</sup>Pa/<sup>238</sup>U活度比。设置为1以获得长期平衡。

help_RaU_UPb.en: Apply a secular disequilibrium correction to the U-Pb data, based on the the initial <sup>226</sup>Ra/<sup>238</sup>U activity ratio
help_RaU_UPb.cn: 指定样品的（初始或测量的）<sup>226</sup>Ra/<sup>238</sup>U活度比。设置为1以获得长期平衡。

help_ThU_UPb.en: Apply a secular disequilibrium correction to the U-Pb data, based on the initial or measured 230Th/238U activity ratio, where the initial activity ratio is equivalent to the Th/U-fractionation factor between the sample and the magma. Alternatively, the initial 230Th/238U activity ratio can also be determined from the measured Th/U-ratio of the magma, determined by geochemical analysis of the whole rock or volcanic glass. This measured ratio is combined with the 232Th/238U-ratio of the minerals to compute the Th/U fractionation factor.
help_ThU_UPb.cn: 指定样品的（初始或测量的）<sup>230</sup>Th/<sup>238</sup>U活度比。设置为1以获得长期平衡。

help_common_Pb_option.en:
apply a common lead correction with one of three methods:
  1. use a nominal initial Pb-composition
  2. use the isochron intercept as the initial Pb-composition
  3. infer the initial Pb-composition from the Stacey & Kramers two stage isotope evolution model
help_common_Pb_option.cn:
使用以下三种方法之一应用普通铅校正：
  1. 从Stacey＆Kramers两阶段同位素演化模型推断出最初的Pb组成
  2. 使用等时线截距作为初始Pb组成
  3. 使用标称的初始Pb组成

help_tanchor.en: Anchor the discordia line fit to a specific concordia age.
help_tanchor.cn: 固定不和谐线以拟合特定的谐和年龄。

help_shownumbers.en: Add labels to the data points or error ellipses marking the corresponding aliquot (i.e., the row number in the input table).
help_shownumbers.cn: 将标签添加每一列数据对应的数据点或误差椭圆（即输入表中的行号）。

help_adaptive.en:
Adaptive KDEs allow the bandwidth of the kernels to vary along the time axis, so that the 'resolution' of the density estimate is high (and the bandwidth small) in densely sampled areas, and the resolution 
is low (large bandwidth) in sparsely sampled areas. <tt>IsoplotR</tt> uses a simple algorithm developed by Abramson (1984) to modify the bandwidth proportionally to the square root of a non-adaptive 'pilot' KDE.
help_adaptive.cn: 自适应KDE允许内核的带宽沿时间轴变化，因此在密集采样区域中密度估计的“分辨率”很高（并且带宽很小），并且在稀疏采样区域中分辨率很低（大带宽）。IsoplotR使用Abramson (1984)开发的一种简单算法来修改带宽，该带宽与非自适应“导频(pilot)”KDE的平方根成比例。

help_pos.en: A position specifier for the labels. Values of 0, 1, 2, 3 and 4 indicate positions at, below, to the left of, above and to the right of the MDS coordinates, respectively.
help_pos.cn: 标签的位置说明符。值1，2，3和4分别表示MDS坐标下方，左侧，上方和右侧的位置。

help_hide_detritals.en: A comma-separated list of sample names or column numbers that should be omitted from the plot. Examples: <tt>1,2,15</tt> or <tt>'N1','N2','T8'</tt>
help_hide_detritals.cn: 以逗号分隔的样本名称表或列号表，应从图中省略。 示例：<tt>1, 2, 15</tt>或 <tt>'N1', 'N2', 'T8'</tt>。

help_randomeffects.en:
• If checked, computes the weighted mean using a random effects model with two sources of uncertainty: the analytical uncertainty and an overdispersion term.
  • Otherwise calculates the ordinary weighted mean, attributing any excess scatter to an underestimation of the analytical uncertainties. The latter approach is the one taken by Isoplot
.
help_randomeffects.cn:
• 若选中，则使用具有两个不确定性来源（分析不确定度和过度离散项）的随机效应模型计算加权平均值。
  • 否则将计算普通加权平均值，任何过度分散将被归因于低估分析不确定性。后一种方法是Isoplot采用的方法。

help_concordia_type.en:
1. Wetherill: 206Pb/238U vs. 207Pb/235U
  2. Tera-Wasserburg: 207Pb/206Pb vs. 238U/206Pb
  3. U-Th-Pb concordia: 208Pb/232Th vs. 206Pb/238U
help_concordia_type.cn:
1. Wetherill谐和曲线: 206Pb/238U vs. 207Pb/235U
  2. Tera-Wasserburg谐和曲线: 207Pb/206Pb vs. 238U/206Pb
  3. U-Th-Pb谐和曲线: 208Pb/232Th vs. 206Pb/238U

help_LambdaLu176.en: The default values of the <sup>176</sup>Lu decay constant and its standard error are taken from Söderlund et al. (2004).
help_LambdaLu176.cn: <sup>176</sup>Lu衰减常数的默认值及其标准误差取自Söderlund et al. (2004)。

help_outlier_col.en:
Fill colour used to mark the outliers. Examples:

'white', 'red', 'blue' ...
'#FF000080', '#808080', ...
rgb(0,1,0,0.5), rgb(0.5,1,0.5), ...

Enter NA for empty plot symbols.
help_outlier_col.cn:
用于标记异常值的填充颜色。

例如：'white', 'red', 'blue' ...
'#FF000080', '#808080', ...
rgb(0,1,0,0.5), rgb(0.5,1,0.5), ...

输入 (NA) 则不填充绘图符号。

help_ThPb_formats.en:
Choose one of three input formats:
  1. X err[X] Y err[Y] rho
    where X is the 232Th/204Pb ratio, Y is the 208Pb/204Pb ratio, and err[X], err[Y] and rho are the uncertainties and error correlations, respectively.
  2. X err[X] Y err[Y] rho
    where X is the 232Th/208Pb ratio, Y is the 204Pb/208Pb ratio, and err[X], err[Y] and rho are the uncertainties and (optional) error correlations, respectively.
  3. X err[X] Y err[Y] Z err[Z]
    where X, err[X], Y, and err[Y] are defined as in option 1, Z is the 232Th/208Pb ratio, and err[Z] is its uncertainty. Here the redundancy between three ratio uncertainties allows the covariance to be determined implicitly.
help_ThPb_formats.cn:
选择以下三种输入格式之一：
  1. X err[X] Y err[Y] rho
    其中X是232Th/204Pb比值，Y是208Pb/204Pb比值，并且err[X]，err[Y]和rho分别是不确定性和误差相关性。
  2. X err[X] Y err[Y] rho
    其中X是232Th/208Pb比值，Y是204Pb/208Pb比值，并且err[X]，err[Y]和rho分别是不确定性和误差相关性。
  3. X err[X] Y err[Y] Z err[Z]
    其中X，err[X]，Y和err[Y]定义如选项1，Z是232Th/208Pb比率，err[Z]是其不确定性。在这里三个比值不确定性之间的冗余允许暗中确定协方差。

help_Pb208Pb204.en: The default values for the <sup>208</sup>Pb/<sup>204</sup>Pb ratio and its standard error are taken from Stacey and Kramers (1975)
help_Pb208Pb204.cn: <sup>208</sup>Pb/<sup>204</sup>Pb 比的默认值及其标准误差取自 Stacey and Kramers (1975)
